lines.text: Maybe there's some kind of turf war going on!
Like, groups of wizards on opposite sides, using tattoos as their gang signs!
Someone saw he had these tattoos, and knew he was from a rival gang, so... pop!
Wait, I'm confused. Does he even have those tattoos?
They'd be under his clothes, right? How would someone even see that?
Not to mention you're bringin' gangs into this. If there's whole wizard gangs we don't know about, we've got a bigger problem than just this guy.
Okay, okay, yeah, it was a wild guess. Sheesh.
